Generation.VectorForged: Quantum intention vector successfully forged and sealed. Ready for physical projection.
Generation.MetadataValidationSuccess: Visual configuration validated against tenant design tokens.

Scarcity.ThresholdReached: Quantum response neutralized: Maximum scan threshold has been reached.
Scarcity.TemporalLimitExceeded: Vector expiration: The temporal validity of this intention has lapsed.

Errors.CryptographicSealFailure: Security breach attempt or encryption collapse: Failed to seal the intention material.
Errors.InvalidVisualMetadata: Rendering failure: Visual metadata does not comply with biosecurity standards.
